publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3509 Tommy Sheridan: Richard Roberts Knitwear, Ayrshire—That the Parliament supports the activities of the trade union at Richard Roberts Knitwear (formerly Charnos) in trying to secure important jobs at its factory in Ayrshire and believes that a policy of public ownership should be applied to companies which withdraw from Scotland, leaving behind misery and unemployment.
